From the "Girl's Art Museum - Decoration" series

~

The Girl's art museum has previously showcased a variety of works. However, the piece we present this time is distinctly different from those past works—it is a modern piece.

[02-1.jpg]

Title: ‘Nameless Paintings’. This work consists of numerous young girls confined within picture frames. The paintings, featuring various poses and emphasizing different body parts, question where humans find excitement in the female form.
The essence of this work lies in eliciting the viewer's thought: “I don't even know this girl's name. But she has a nice body, doesn't she?”

Now, the major difference from previous modern art lies in the fact that “it uses girls to express art.” It stands in stark contrast to past works that found artistic merit in the subject matter of girls.

These girls exist somewhere between furnishings and artwork. While they bear no ownership markings, they can be freely touched, violated, and brought to climax like any other piece of furniture.

[02-2.jpg]

For example, in this painting, two female bodies are bound together in an overlapping position. You can rub your cock against both pussies simultaneously, enjoying both at the same time. Of course, it's also fine to tease one while penetrating the other.

[02-3.jpg]

This painting is bound in an I-balance pose, its body incredibly supple. Though slightly defiant, its limbs are embedded in the wall, preventing any resistance.
If the paintings refuse to obey, make sure they understand their place. Insert yourself into their tight little pussy while kneading their breasts, then make them cum repeatedly with lover-like tongue kisses. They'll become obedient in no time.

[02-4.jpg]

There are also paintings depicting figures with their backs turned. By exploring different poses and body parts in each painting, you can experiment with various play scenarios.
Fuck her from behind while kneading her breasts. Give her an enema and make her hold it in. Spanking is also a good option. In this way, modern art offers countless ways to enjoy it, depending entirely on your creativity.

[02-5.jpg]

How did you like it? The exhibition rooms at the Girls' aet museum still have spaces awaiting new works. Modern art pieces that breathe fresh life into these rooms will surely add further charm to the museum.
Of course, we plan to continue exhibiting classic works as we have done before. We will keep exploring new artistic expressions, so we look forward to your continued support.
